FuncDef: The refresh bgp evpn command configures soft reset for BGP EVPN connections.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv6 address of a peer.
The prefix is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Softly resets BGP EVPN connections in the inbound direction.
-

Softly resets BGP EVPN connections in the outbound direction.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To softly reset BGP EVPN connections, run the refresh bgp evpn command. BGP EVPN soft reset allows the system to refresh a BGP EVPN routing table without tearing down the BGP EVPN connections and to apply a new filtering policy.
